identified_issues: Agent failed to follow escalation procedure
Lack of empathy in customer interaction

call_transcript.full_text: Hello, this is Alex from customer support. How can I help you today? Hi Alex, I'm Sandra Miller and I'm really frustrated with my recent order. I've been trying to get this resolved for over a week now and nobody seems to be able to help me. I understand you're frustrated Sandra. Let me look into your account. Can you provide me with your order number? Yes, it's #12345. I've already given this to three other agents and nothing has been done. I see the order here. It looks like there was a shipping delay. Well that's not good enough! I need this resolved today or I want to speak to your manager. I'm not authorized to do that right now. Let me see what other options we have. This is ridiculous! I've been a customer for 5 years and this is how you treat me?
call_transcript.summary: Agent failed to follow escalation procedure, customer became increasingly frustrated.

Well that's not good enough! I need this resolved today or I want to speak to your manager.
I'm not authorized to do that right now. Let me see what other options we have.
This is ridiculous! I've been a customer for 5 years and this is how you treat me?
